item.title: About
item.description: I am currently working at as a software engineer contracting for early stage startups. Feel free to have a look at my LinkedIn or Github

item.title: Projects
item.description: I’ve worked on some personal toy projects. Web Apps A remote job board for africans: Workally A directory of Top Ai tools for any task: AiToolsBoard Submit daily kind acts. Includes a leaderboard: KindnessQuest Old/Abandoned Shedule love messages to your loved ones: Lovina A shortlet (AirBnb) apartment booking platform: Stayzen Top Twitter (X) account to follow based on their career/categories: TopXprofiles
